channel.title: I was fooling around and ruined my srl
channel.description:
[Runtime Error] : Exception: '99999999999999' is not a valid integer value in line 104 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\srl\srl\core\Setup.scar
i put mouse speed to 99999999999999 and now it wont even let me run it to change back, i tried deleteing it and reinstalling, nothing works, what should I do

item.title: I was fooling around and ruined my srl
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Go to your SCAR folder and delete SRL.cfg and run Setup.scar again.

Read full topic
item.source: I was fooling around and ruined my srl

item.title: I was fooling around and ruined my srl
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Integer:
Max : 2147483647
Min : -2147483648

Thats the range of an Integer

item.title: I was fooling around and ruined my srl
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

Search your computer for “SRL”

and delete anything that comes up.

Then try downloading then reinstalling again.
